    • Method Detail

      • positionToIndex

        public static long positionToIndex(double position,
                                   @StdString
                                   String unit,
                                   @Const @ByRef
                                   SetDimension dimension)
        Converts a position given in a unit into an index according to the dimension descriptor.

        This function can be used to get the index of e.g. a certain point in time in a Dimension that represents time. The units of the position and that provided by the Dimension must match, i.e. must be scalable versions of the same SI unit.

        Parameters:
        position - The position
        unit - The unit in which the position is given, may be "none"
        dimension - The dimension descriptor for the respective dimension.
        Returns:
        The calculated index.
        See Also:
        SetDimension

      • positionToIndex

                                   @StdString
                                   String unit,
                                   @Const @ByRef
                                   SampledDimension dimension)
        Converts a position given in a unit into an index according to the dimension descriptor.

        This function can be used to get the index of e.g. a certain point in time in a Dimension that represents time. The units of the position and that provided by the Dimension must match, i.e. must be scalable versions of the same SI unit.

        Parameters:
        position - The position
        unit - The unit in which the position is given, may be "none"
        dimension - The dimension descriptor for the respective dimension.
        Returns:
        The calculated index.
        See Also:
        SampledDimension

                                     NDSize offsets,
                                     @ByRef
                                     NDSize counts)
        Returns the offsets and element counts associated with position and extent of a Tag and the referenced DataArray.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag.
        array - A referenced data array.
        offsets - The resulting offset.
        counts - The number of elements to read from data
        See Also:

public static DataView retrieveData(@Const @ByRef

                                           @Cast(value="size_t")

                                           @Cast(value="size_t")
                                           long referenceIndex)
        Retrieve the data referenced by the given position and extent of the MultiTag.
        Parameters:
        tag - The multi tag.
        positionIndex - The index of the position.
        referenceIndex - The index of the reference from which data should be returned.
        Returns:
        The data referenced by position and extent.
        See Also:
        DataView, MultiTag

      • positionInData

        public static boolean positionInData(@Const @ByRef
                                     DataArray data,
                                     @Const @ByRef
                                     NDSize position)
        Checks whether a given position is in the extent of the given DataArray.
        Parameters:
        data - The data array.
        position - The position.
        Returns:
        True if the position is in the extent of the data array, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        DataArray, NDSize

      • positionAndExtentInData

        public static boolean positionAndExtentInData(@Const @ByRef
                                              DataArray data,
                                              @Const @ByRef
                                              NDSize position,
                                              @Const @ByRef
                                              NDSize count)
        Checks whether a given position plus count is in the extent of the given DataArray.
        Parameters:
        data - The DataArray.
        position - The position
        count - The number of elements per dimension.
        Returns:
        True if position and count are in the extent of the data array, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        DataArray, NDSize

        Retruns the feature data associated with a Tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - The Tag whos feature data is requested
        featureIndex - The index of the desired feature. Default is 0.
        Returns:
        The associated data.
        See Also:

      • retrieveFeatureData

public static DataView retrieveFeatureData(@Const @ByRef

                                                  long featureIndex)
        Returns the feature data accosiated with the given MuliTag's position.
        Parameters:
        tag - The MultiTag whos feature data is requested.
        positionIndex - The index of the selected position, respectively the selected tag of the MultiTag.
        featureIndex - The index of the desired feature.
        Returns:
        The associated data.
        See Also:
        DataView, MultiTag
